005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IAnyAtomicItem;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type.impl.AbstractItemType;
010
011import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
012
013/**
014 * An abstract implementation of an atomic type.
015 *
016 * @param <T>
017 *          the Java type of the item supported by the implementation
018 */
019public abstract class AbstractAtomicOrUnionType<T extends IAnyAtomicItem>
020    extends AbstractItemType<T>
021    implements IAtomicOrUnionType<T> {
022  @NonNull
023  private final ICastExecutor<T> castExecutor;
024
025  /**
026   * Construct a new atomic type.
027   *
028   * @param itemClass
029   *          the item class this atomic type supports
030   * @param castExecutor
031   *          the executor used to cast an item to an item of this type
032   */
033  public AbstractAtomicOrUnionType(
034      @NonNull Class<T> itemClass,
035      @NonNull ICastExecutor<T> castExecutor) {
036    super(itemClass);
037    this.castExecutor = castExecutor;
038  }
039
040  @Override
041  public T cast(IAnyAtomicItem item) {
042    return castExecutor.cast(item);
043  }
044}
